import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './style.css' const MovieRow = (props) => { return (
{props.list.title}
{props.list.items.results.map(movie => ) }
) } export default MovieRow;
